title: The Farmacy Natural and Specialty
description: Full natural foods grocery with organic and/or local produce, vitamins & supplements, bulk items, etc, as well as some Middle Eastern specialty foods. Special ordering available. Deli is open 11-2 Monday-Saturday, offering soups (always 1 vegan option), sandwiches & wraps (some meat options, but mostly vegetarian and any thing non-vegan can be made so), a selection of side salads and green salads with vegan, house-made dressings and smoothies. To-go case is always open.
